preConditions.sqlCheck: select count (*) from all_constraints where constraint_name = 'UNQ_REGULATORY_INFO_ALIAS'

changeSet.author: scottmat
changeSet.sql: update product_order set version = 0 where version is null

changeSet.author: scottmat
changeSet.sql: update BILLING_SESSION set version = 0 where version is null

changeSet.author: andrew
changeSet.sql: update research_project set regulatory_designation = 'GENERAL_CLIA_CAP' where jira_ticket_key = 'RP-805'

changeSet.author: epolk
changeSet.sql: insert into PRODUCT_FAMILY_AUD (product_family_id, name, rev, revtype) select pf.product_family_id, pf.name, min(pa.rev), 0 from PRODUCT_FAMILY pf join PRODUCT_AUD pa on pa.product_family = pf.product_family_id where not exists (select 1 from PRODUCT_FAMILY_AUD pfa where pfa.product_family_id = pf.product_family_id) group by pf.product_family_id, pf.name;
